channel.title: Whats wrong?
channel.description:
hi i hawe again same problem with my RUN_LS when i am run on Localhost is is working when runing on my ip it is like that ..... [url=http://img402.imageshack.us/i/errorod.png/]http://img402.imageshack.us/i/errorod.png/[/url]
and 1 more thing ... if i am doing http://localhost on my web is nothing .... if i put http://-my ip- it is working only on that ... like myip/phpmyadmin/... myip/xampp/.... myip/index.php on localhost is not working ... can any 1 help me plz :( cant understand whats wrong .... before i hawe microsoft DB and Mysql and now all uninstaled but my localhost not working .... just everithing on my ip like localhost.. and everybody can see if opening my Ip.

item.title: Whats wrong?
item.dc:creator: @bengina bengina
item.description:
@bengina wrote:

I think you should try Easy rsc as this doesnt require sql and it is a good starting point. It was made using Rscd v25 and will be alot easier for you to understand. There is also a very good TUT made by Yong Min on how to configure and add various modifications to the source.

http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,340170.0.html this is the link to download the source.
http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,363007.0.html This is the link to Yong Mins excellent Tut.

Hope this helps.

Read full topic
